thread.title: Blue Ivy's Grammys Cat Purse Costs More Than Your Rent
thread.title_full: Blue Ivy's Grammys Cat Purse Costs More Than Your Rent

title: Blue Ivy's Grammys Cat Purse Costs More Than Your Rent
text: Blue Ivy's Grammys Cat Purse Costs More Than Your Rent Most Popular Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Last night, Blue Ivy attended the Grammys in a Pepto pink Gucci suit― a sweet ode to Prince , who passed away last year. The jacket―which topped a signature Prince ruffle blouse―even had a surprise back: Getty Most Popular But the lewk didn't stop there! Blue Ivy, miniature fashion icon, paired the outfit with a super cute, kid-friendly cat handbag. Getty The sparkly hot pink purse was also Gucci, and came with a less kid-friendly price tag: The clutch (which is now sold out) was last listed on Gucci's website at $2,490 . Yahoo Style spotted the clutch on the consignment site, the Real Real for $1,985 . A steal! Blue Ivy did seem to enjoy the purse a lot: GIF Though it appeared to be empty―which is a good thing, considering her reaction when her mom won a Grammy ―since she's, you know, five. GIF
